name: Krack Out - Crazy Robots
description:
Breakout-Clone with 20 levels, each level has several dynamic backgrounds. Use your mouse to control the bat. Destroy all bricks to rich the next level. Every level has a different look.

Version 1.1.0 [2017-06-12]:
- Renamed the Gallery Title.
- Renamed Gallery-Button to "Levels".
- Added Level-Selection Buttons to the Gallery-Section. You can play all successfully solved Levels again.

Version: 1.0.0
- Main.

Features:
- 20 Levels
- Level-Gallery
- Bonus Bricks like Laser-Bat, Big-Bat and more ...

Difficult: easy
Genre: Casual
Engine: Game Maker Studio

Main-Theme composed by:
Alexander Hilliger

Coding & Rendering:
Hilliger Media

Please report bugs and suggestions to the comments.
